column5: Just want to say a big congrats to the greatest power trio, RUSH, on their induction to the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame tonight! I'm sure there are many fans on the board here who are as excited as I am!  Crank them up all day!!  Cheers, Colin

I've been listening to RUSH since about 1978 and they have been my favorite ever since. While I don't listen to their stuff after Grace under pressure as often as the stuff up to GUP you can't deny they have a ton of material and most of it is amazing. They belong in the HOF, its a shame it took this long.  Congrats RUSH and thanks for 36 years of listening pleasure!!!!

It's about time!!!   They have never been a band who needs or seeks accolades, but it's great to see them recognized!   Geddy Lee said "my mom is excited about it, so for that its worth it".  All class.

About 15yrs ago when I was a utility locator, I had the pleasure of marking out some gas and communication lines for Alex Lifeson at his house. Total class act. He invited me into his garage and we had a drink on the hood of his 'benz.  Shot the @#$t for a good 1/2hr. I still have my word order signed and framed on the wall.

i love rush for sure,i have seen them 4 times,and they are long overdue for their HOF induction,but hey better late than never !!!! awesome music,and very down to earth guys!!! congrats rush keep the tunes comming ....cheers
Bout time!!! They've been in my Hall of Fame since childhood.
Growing up,never cared for them.Don't really know why,but the last 10 years or so ,just love there music. Congrats guys,knowing now,well deserved!  Better late than never I guess

Paid an entire dollar to see them at The Rock Pile in Hamilton in 70's. My buddy was bouncing there and we helped them load the van on a Saturday night. 10 years latter I see Getty Lee at a Blue Jays game, he says hey your the guy from Hamilton. Real people, never rock stars.
Can't wait to see them July 6th in Hamilton!!!  Three amazing musicians that definitely have earned the honor!
